price: 31. Kumana baxsan kartaan dhulka, mana lihidin Alle ka sokow sokeeye iyo gargaare midna.
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
